name: ORS Official and Social Visit Summary Report
description:
A summary count by year, month and visit status of the number of Social visits and Official visits booked for a date range for a specific establishment.
VIS0017 - v00.00.02 Last Modified: 11/11/2016

dataset.name: Social Visits
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.OFFENDER_VISIT_ID AS OFFENDER_VISIT_ID, AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_DATE AS VISIT_DATE, TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_DATE, 'SYYYY')) AS YEAR_OF_VISIT_DATE, TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_DATE, 'MM')) AS MONTH_OF_VISIT_DATE, CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'SCH' THEN 'Scheduled' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'NORM' THEN 'Normal Completion' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'CANC' THEN 'Cancelled' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'EXP' THEN 'Expired' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'HMPOP' THEN 'Terminated by Staff' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'OFFEND' THEN 'Prisoner Completed Early' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'VISITOR' THEN 'Visitor Completed Early' ELSE AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS END AS STATUS_OF_VISIT, AT_VISIT_HIST_ESTAB.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_TYPE = 'SCON' THEN 'Social' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_TYPE = 'OFFI' THEN 'Official' ELSE AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_TYPE END AS VISIT_TYPE_HELD FROM OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_VISIT_HIST_ESTAB, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_VISITS AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS AT_UAC WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_VISIT_HIST_ESTAB.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_VISIT_HIST_ESTAB.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_UAC.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_UAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND ((AT_UAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_DATE BETWEEN (SELECT START_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Start Date','D',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */) AND (SELECT END_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('End Date','D',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:1) */) AND CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_TYPE = 'SCON' THEN 'Social' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_TYPE = 'OFFI' THEN 'Official' ELSE AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_TYPE END = 'Social')), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_VISIT_ID, VISIT_DATE, YEAR_OF_VISIT_DATE, MONTH_OF_VISIT_DATE, STATUS_OF_VISIT, DESCRIPTION, VISIT_TYPE_HELD, CASE WHEN STATUS_OF_VISIT = 'Normal Completion' THEN 'Completed' ELSE CASE WHEN STATUS_OF_VISIT = 'VDE' THEN 'Visitor Declined Entry' ELSE STATUS_OF_VISIT END END AS V_VISIT_STATUS FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Official Visits
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.OFFENDER_VISIT_ID AS OFFENDER_VISIT_ID, AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_DATE AS VISIT_DATE, TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_DATE, 'SYYYY')) AS YEAR_OF_VISIT_DATE, TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_DATE, 'MM')) AS MONTH_OF_VISIT_DATE, CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'SCH' THEN 'Scheduled' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'NORM' THEN 'Normal Completion' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'CANC' THEN 'Cancelled' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'EXP' THEN 'Expired' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'HMPOP' THEN 'Terminated by Staff' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'OFFEND' THEN 'Prisoner Completed Early' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'VISITOR' THEN 'Visitor Completed Early' ELSE AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS END AS STATUS_OF_VISIT, AT_VISIT_HIST_ESTAB.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_TYPE = 'SCON' THEN 'Social' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_TYPE = 'OFFI' THEN 'Official' ELSE AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_TYPE END AS VISIT_TYPE_HELD FROM OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_VISIT_HIST_ESTAB, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_VISITS AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS AT_UAC WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_VISIT_HIST_ESTAB.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_VISIT_HIST_ESTAB.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_UAC.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_UAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND ((AT_UAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_DATE BETWEEN (SELECT START_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Start Date','D',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */) AND (SELECT END_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('End Date','D',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:1) */) AND CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_TYPE = 'SCON' THEN 'Social' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_TYPE = 'OFFI' THEN 'Official' ELSE AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_TYPE END = 'Official')), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_VISIT_ID, VISIT_DATE, YEAR_OF_VISIT_DATE, MONTH_OF_VISIT_DATE, STATUS_OF_VISIT, DESCRIPTION, VISIT_TYPE_HELD, CASE WHEN STATUS_OF_VISIT = 'Normal Completion' THEN 'Completed' ELSE CASE WHEN STATUS_OF_VISIT = 'VDE' THEN 'Visitor Declined Entry' ELSE STATUS_OF_VISIT END END AS V_VISIT_STATUS_OFFICIAL FROM dataset_base_)
